root.message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 1-3-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: Ministerial Diploma No. 117/2015, of December 31; decree nº 47/2018, of 6 August, presidential decree nº 9/2015 of 13 March, resolution nº 18/2015 of 10 July
